name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Currency conversion plugin for Harvest app

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts the currencies and auto-populates the Harvest expense fields

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Performs currency conversion and writes the conversion date as well as the resulting amount directly into the open Harvest Expense.
